project.name: promotion
project.description: Visibility through gadgets might be controversial, but many users and developers are eager to inform their social environment that they use Gentoo and are proud of it. This subproject, which involves the Gentoo store, makes sure users are not denied access to the various promotional material that is available.

longdescription.p: Stickers, posters, cups, t-shirts, pens, ... All these objects can be used to promote Gentoo with. And lots of users are more than happy to use such gadgets. This project therefor aims to design the necessary gadgets and see if those can be sold through the Gentoo Project and therefor help the Gentoo distribution financially.
